Sentencas: Seals are required for a functioning solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Self-repairable glass seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These seals must function at high temperatures of 600-900 degrees C and in oxidizing and reducing environments of the fuels and air.
Titulo: Self-repairable glass seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Among the different type of seals, the metal-ceramic seals require significant attention, research, and development because the brittle nature of ceramics and glasses leads to fracture and loss of seal integrity and functionality.
Titulo: Self-repairable glass seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A novel concept of self-healing/self-repairable glass seals is proposed, developed, and used for making metal-glass-ceramic seals for application in SOFC for enhancing reliability and life.
Titulo: Self-repairable glass seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Glasses and glass-ceramics displaying self-healing behavior are investigated and used to fabricate seals.
Titulo: Self-repairable glass seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The performance of these seals under long-term exposure at higher temperatures coupled with thermal cycling is characterized.
Titulo: Self-repairable glass seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Self-repairability of these glass seals is also demonstrated by leak tests along with the long-term performance.
Titulo: Self-repairable glass seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An approach for studying the kinetics of crack healing in glasses and glass-ceramics responsible for self-repair is briefly described.
Titulo: Self-repairable glass seals for solid oxide fuel cells
